creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: three lines of calligraphy; fourth line of smaller characters including signature (?); rectangular relief seal at URC; small square intaglio seal LLC; small square relief seal LLC; on satin mounted to woven sheet
markings: URC, rectangular red relief seal; LLC, red square intaglio seal; LLC, red square relief seal; on back, bottom edge, in pencil: [Michitomi]
title: Poem
